<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H4887|מְשַׁח]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשַׁח‎</span> **verb** ==smear, anoint== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; originally probably as Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wipe*** or***stroke with the hand*** (compare [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Semitic i. 215; 2nd ed., 283</sup>), anoint, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁח‎</span> ***anoint***; on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משת‎</span>, ***id.*** (?) in Aramaic inscription see [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>ii.1. No.145, C, 1</sup>; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משחא‎</span> ***oil*** [[BDB#Vog|Vog]]<sup>No.16</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***anoint, feast, dine*** [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>Lex 176</sup>; (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***mašâ—u***</u></abbr> is measure; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְשַׁח‎</span> ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***measurement***, compare [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Prol. 178</sup> [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>282</sup>)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Num.3.25|Num 3:25]] + 2 t.; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשָֽׁחֲךָ‎</span> [[Ps.45.8|Ps 45:8]]; [[1Sam.10.1|1Sam 10:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשָׁחוֺ‎</span> [[2Chr.22.7|2Chr 22:7]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשַׁחְתָּ‎</span> [[Gen.31.13|Gen 31:13]] + 12 t., + 9 t. Perfect; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְשַׁח‎</span> [[Lev.16.32|Lev 16:32]] + 6 t.; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְשָׁ֑חוּ‎</span> [[Amos.6.6|Amos 6:6]], + 13 t. Imperfect; ***Imperative*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשָׁחֵהוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.16.12|1Sam 16:12]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁחוּ‎</span> [[Isa.21.5|Isa 21:5]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשׁוֺחַ‎</span> [[Jer.22.14|Jer 22:14]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֹׁחַ‎</span> [[Judg.9.8|Judg 9:8]]; [[Dan.9.24|Dan 9:24]] + [[Hos.8.3|Hos 8:3]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשְׁחָה‎</span> [[Exod.29.29|Exod 29:29]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשׁחֳךָ‎</span>[[1Sam.15.1|1Sam 15:1]] ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשְׁחוֺ‎</span> [[Lev.7.36|Lev 7:36]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשְׁחָתָם‎</span> [[Exod.40.15|Exod 40:15]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משְׁחִים‎</span> [[Judg.9.15|Judg 9:15]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשׁוּחַ‎</span> [[2Sam.3.39|2Sam 3:39]] ([[BDB#We|We]] suggests derivation from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁח‎</span>, defective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משׁח‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֻשַׁח‎</span>), wrongly read as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשֻׁחַ‎</span>; or by transposition <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משׁוח‎</span> may have been mistaken for an unexampled <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּשַׁח‎</span> Hoph\`al Participle of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוח‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשִׁיחַ‎</span> [[2Sam.1.21|2Sam 1:21]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשֻׁח‎</span> (or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נמשׁח‎</span>) Manuscripts [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֻׁחִים‎</span> [[Exod.29.2|Exod 29:2]] + 4 t; — 

**1.** ***smear***, house with colour (paint) [[Jer.22.14|Jer 22:14]] shield with oil (anoint) [[Isa.21.5|Isa 21:5]]; [[2Sam.1.21|2Sam 1:21]] (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]; [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּלִי מָשׁוּחַ‎</span> ***weapon anointed***; Peters<sup>JBL 893, 56</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּלֵי מָשׁוּחַ‎</span> ***weapons of one*** (the king) ***anointed***); the person, with ointments [[Amos.6.6|Amos 6:6]] unleavened cakes, with oil [[Exod.29.2|Exod 29:2]]; [[Lev.2.4|Lev 2:4]]; [[Num.6.15|Num 6:15]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2.** ***anoint***, as consecration, solemn setting apart to an office, always by the use of oil poured on the head: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לנביא‎</span> as a prophet [[1Kgs.19.16|1Kgs 19:16]] (Elisha by Elijah) [[Isa.61.1|Isa 61:1]] elsewhere of king, with accusative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶלֶךְ‎</span> [[Judg.9.8|Judg 9:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), so [[Hos.8.3|Hos 8:3]] reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמְּשֹׁחַ מֶלֶךְ‎</span> (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמַּשָּׂא מ‎</span>) [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]; also [[Hos.7.3|Hos 7:3]] reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְשְׁחוּ‎</span> (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׂמְּחוּ‎</span>) [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]; elsewhere accusative of person [[1Sam.16.3|1Sam 16:3]]; [[1Sam.16.12|1Sam 16:12]]; [[1Sam.16.13|1Sam 16:13]]; [[1Kgs.1.39|1Kgs 1:39]]; [[2Kgs.11.12|2Kgs 11:12]]; [[2Kgs.23.30|2Kgs 23:30]]; [[2Chr.22.7|2Chr 22:7]]; [[2Chr.23.11|2Chr 23:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשֶׁמֶן קָדְשִׁי‎</span> [[Ps.89.21|Ps 89:21]] ***with my holy oil***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁמן שָׂשׂוֺן‎</span> [[Ps.45.8|Ps 45:8]] (figurative); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span>, [[2Sam.19.11|2Sam 19:11]] whom ***we have anointed over*** us; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמֶלֶךְ‎</span> [[1Kgs.1.45|1Kgs 1:45]]; [[1Kgs.5.15|1Kgs 5:15]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמֶלֶךְ‎</span> [[Judg.9.15|Judg 9:15]]; [[2Sam.2.4|2Sam 2:4]]; [[2Sam.2.7|2Sam 2:7]]; [[1Kgs.19.15|1Kgs 19:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על ישׂראל‎</span> ***over Israel*** [[1Sam.15.1|1Sam 15:1]]; [[1Sam.15.17|1Sam 15:17]]; [[2Sam.5.3|2Sam 5:3]] = [[1Chr.11.3|1Chr 11:3]]; [[2Sam.5.17|2Sam 5:17]]; [[2Sam.12.7|2Sam 12:7]]; [[1Kgs.1.34|1Kgs 1:34]]; [[1Kgs.19.16|1Kgs 19:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶליֿשׂראל‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.3|2Kgs 9:3]]; [[2Kgs.9.6|2Kgs 9:6]]; [[2Kgs.9.12|2Kgs 9:12]] (Ehpraimitic source); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לנגיד‎</span> [[1Chr.29.22|1Chr 29:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על‎</span> [[1Sam.9.16|1Sam 9:16]]; [[1Sam.10.1|1Sam 10:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשׁוּחַ מֶלֶךְ‎</span> [[2Sam.3.39|2Sam 3:39]] (? see above) 

**3.** ***anoint, consecrate*** to religious service: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** Aaronic priests, only [[BDB#P|P]], with accusative of person [[Exod.28.41|Exod 28:41]]; [[Exod.29.7|Exod 29:7]]; [[Exod.30.30|Exod 30:30]]; [[Exod.40.13|Exod 40:13]]; [[Exod.40.15|Exod 40:15]] (3 t. in verse); [[Lev.7.36|Lev 7:36]]; [[Lev.8.12|Lev 8:12]]; [[Lev.16.32|Lev 16:32]] absolute [[Exod.29.29|Exod 29:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הכהנים הַמְּשֻׁחִים‎</span> [[Num.3.3|Num 3:3]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** sacred things: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצֵּבָה‎</span> [[Gen.31.13|Gen 31:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); tabernacle and its sacred vessels [[Exod.29.36|Exod 29:36]]; [[Exod.30.26|Exod 30:26]]; [[Exod.40.9|Exod 40:9]]; [[Exod.40.10|Exod 40:10]]; [[Exod.40.11|Exod 40:11]]; [[Lev.8.10|Lev 8:10]]; [[Lev.8.11|Lev 8:11]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קדשׁ קדשׁים‎</span> [[Dan.9.24|Dan 9:24]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְשַׁח‎</span> [[1Chr.14.8|1Chr 14:8]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמָּשַׁח‎</span> [[Lev.6.13|Lev 6:13]] + 3 t; — ***be anointed***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎למלך על כל ישׂראל‎</span> [[1Chr.14.8|1Chr 14:8]] Aaron and his sons [[Lev.6.13|Lev 6:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); altar [[Num.7.10|Num 7:10]]; [[Num.7.84|Num 7:84]]; [[Num.7.88|Num 7:88]].
